plots data and gam fit vs. time

Source: R/gamPlotCalc.r
dot-gamPlotCalc.Rd

plots data and gam fit vs. time

.gamPlotCalc(dep, tsdat, pgam, iSpec, analySpec, t.deriv = FALSE,
  alpha = 0.05, dayStep = 10, step.pt = "none", q.doy,
  flow.detrended = flow.detrended,
  salinity.detrended = salinity.detrended)

Arguments

dep

variable dep
tsdat

variable tsdat
pgam

variable pgam
iSpec

variable iSpec
analySpec

variable analySpec
t.deriv

variable t.deriv
alpha

variable alpha
dayStep

variable dayStep
step.pt

variable step.pt
q.doy

vector of days of year
flow.detrended

data generated by detrended.flow. Default = flow.detrended.
salinity.detrended

data generated by detrended.salinity. Default = salinity.detrended.
